name: FountainHead.Class.ClassItemsContainer

classitems.description: The currently active tab. This is controlled by this component to allow us to change the tab whenever a documentation item is clicked in the index panel.
classitems.name: activeTab

classitems.description:
Handle resetting tabs container to the index panel any time that this component receives attrs. The only props passed in to this component are the class items for the container, so we know if they change in any way that this is the right time to update the tabs panel.

NOTE: GUESS WHAT! This hook doens’t only get called when passed props change! There is some crazy behavior where this hook will get called ONCE and only ONCE when an internal property changes after the props for this component has changed. Super weird. For now we’re ‘fixing’ it by also passing in the class name and using that as a check to reset the activeTab
classitems.name: didReceiveAttrs

classitems.description: This class’ array of event documentation items.
classitems.name: event

classitems.description:
Action bound to each documentation item in the index panel. Clicking any item will trigger this with the documentation item as an argument. Use the passed doc item to:

  • Change to the panel matching the doc item type
  • Scroll to that item using the itemtype and name to construct the DOM id
classitems.name: goToItem

classitems.description: This class’ array of method documentation items.
classitems.name: method

classitems.description: Name of the class. Is checked in didUpdateAttrs to know if the tabs should be reset to the index panel
classitems.name: name

classitems.description: This class’ array of property documentation items.
classitems.name: property

classitems.description: Closure action passed into the tab component. This action is called whenever a tab is clicked with the id of the tab. Use this to update the controlling activeTab property for the tabs DDAU style.
classitems.name: tabsChanged

props.name: elementId
props.description: The id of the tab, controls current tab displayed

description:
Tab container for the class’ documentation items. Component handles running a controlled instance of core-tabs by tracking activeTab internally and passing tabsChanged to the core-tabs instance.

The active tab is reset to the index panel anytime that the name (of the class) changes.

method.description:
Action bound to each documentation item in the index panel. Clicking any item will trigger this with the documentation item as an argument. Use the passed doc item to:

  • Change to the panel matching the doc item type
  • Scroll to that item using the itemtype and name to construct the DOM id
method.name: goToItem

method.description: Closure action passed into the tab component. This action is called whenever a tab is clicked with the id of the tab. Use this to update the controlling activeTab property for the tabs DDAU style.
method.name: tabsChanged

props.name: elementId
props.description: The id of the tab, controls current tab displayed

NOTE: GUESS WHAT! This hook doens’t only get called when passed props change! There is some crazy behavior where this hook will get called ONCE and only ONCE when an internal property changes after the props for this component has changed. Super weird.
